REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2530 reute h f BC-DU-PONT-<DD>-UPS-STAK 03-23 0047

TEXT.TITLE: DU PONT <DD> UPS STAKE IN PERCEPTIVE SYSTEMS
TEXT.BODY: Du Pont Co has increased its equity stake in <Perceptive Systems Inc> to 33.5 pct from 20 pct, Perceptive Systems said. Perceptive Systems, a venture capital firm based in Houston, makes digital imaging equipment. Reuter
